Well mentally some of us are not and if we seen more movies depicting our people other than slaves we might not always have that slave mentality!?....there is more to our history!...kings and queens, warriors and soldiers, fighters and peace keepers, lovers and haters!..not just the oppressed and the servants!....I for one would pass on this it puts you in a mind frame that makes me angry to see my people belittled and even though they are acting I feel for the actors because it has to seem real!...no more slave movies or servant movies my.opinion!

Why do some of these women want to show that they're not pregnant? We get it. Men AND women undermine that time of the month. We ask each other if we're good. That's just life. And no, not everyone is childish and laughs if you do have an accident. I wore a white uniform for 4 yrs and yeah I had accidents. I was always self concise. You could say, """"Society shouldn't shame you."""" But it's not society's problem. It's mine. I got to clean that shit. It's annoying as hell, but it happens. Deal with it. Want to raise awareness, share the Key & Peele video or send pads to little girls in Africa that stay home for a week a month and miss school. But whatever, that's your prerogative.
